Projects

Campus Tree Mapping Project

With around 240 species and 6,800 trees spanning a wide range of ages, the Penn campus is interesting for investigating biodiversity and carbon capture of trees.

RoboticsComputer VisionEcology & Sustainability
Conformal Risk Control in Generalist Cellular Segmentation

Implemented conformal risk control of false negative rate of cellular semantic segmentation task.

Uncertainty QuantificationComputer Vision
Active Simultaneous Localization and Mapping in Unstructured Environment with a Quadrotor

This paper proposes an active SLAM system that allows an agent to explore its surroundings efficiently based on information theoretic criterion.

RoboticsSLAM
Towards Robust Transfer Learning - Preventing the Transfer of Spurious Features with Task Interpolation

We show that the transfer of spurious features can be largely prevented by a simple task interpolation-based transfer algorithm that requires no more target images nor epochs than canonical fine-tuning.

Transfer LearningRobustness
Improve visual-inertial odometry accuracy and robustness

Tested Vins-Mono, Vins-Fusion, and ORB-SLAM on a drone platform and improved the VIO odometry accuracy and robustness.

Sign Language Translation

Used OpenPose and implemented an LSTM network that translates sign language videos to text.
